chara.textHome:
I'm here alone while Tsukuyo
goes to buy juice.

It'd be risky to leave our things
unattended on the beach.

Yeah! I'm full of energy
after that big breakfast.

Now I can have fun without
worrying about the heat.
Got my water...
I'm all ready!

Tsukuyo tends to get heat exhaustion easily
so I made her some special beef wrapped
erengi mushrooms for breakfast.
There's some left, want one?
Hmm, Tsukuyo's still not here...?

The fireworks are going to start
any minute, and I'm hungry.
Wanna check out the food stalls?

At night, the sea looks so dark,
like it could pull you right in... It's scary.
But it's gorgeous when the moonlight hits it.
I'm great at swimming!

I always pick it when I can in gym class...
I even got scouted for swim club!
You don't believe me?
I'll show you!

Witches show up wherever
there are crowds...
This beach is no exception.
Let's take it out so it can't ruin our day!
Ah, could you wait for me to change?

I don't mind going to Endless Mirrors,
but not in my nice swimsuit...

The other day I got taken to
this incredible private beach.
Hey, wanna see the photos I took of it?
Oh no! I need to get groceries...
Wait, I don't have to do chores today.

It's nice to be free, but now
I'm off my game...
*Giggle*
There!
Sandcastle...complete!
I'm good with my hands, see?

It's because I'm a bamboo
craftsman's daughter.
Mm-hmm!

Is Tsukuyo worried about me
not doing my summer assignments?

Okay! I put it off since I was so busy,
but now I'll get it done!

I took a break from my chores today,
so Dad'll be grumpy when I get back.

It sucks to have to spend more,
but I'll get him a souvenir.
Mmm?!
Delicious!

I bought this bento at Chiaki's. 
It's cold fried chicken,
only available during summer!
I gotta tell Riko how good it is!

Someone said they saw Kanagi down
at the beach, but that can't be right.
She's way too busy with her part-time job...
Owww...

I didn't bother with sunscreen
and I'm paying for it now.

It's kind of embarrassing, but I'll have
to ask Tsukuyo to put aloe on my back.

Is it THAT weird for twins to
wear different swimsuit sizes?!
Yeah, not weird at all!
Everyone's different!
It's a good thing!
